pr_title: [NETBEANS-3700] No more harcoding for Code Coverage Highlights.

timeline.bodyText: Why "nbcoverage"? Perhaps just "coverage"? (Everything in NetBeans is NetBeans...)
timeline.author: eirikbakke
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,4 +62,9 @@
     <fontcolor name="LastOperation" bgColor="6f9f5a"/>
     <fontcolor name="StepOutOperation" bgColor="2D6035"/>
 
+    <fontcolor name="nbcoverage-covered" bgColor="0F4F40"/>
+    <fontcolor name="nbcoverage-uncovered" bgColor="4F0F40"/>
+    <fontcolor name="nbcoverage-inferred" bgColor="1F4F40"/>
+    <fontcolor name="nbcoverage-partial" bgColor="909040"/>

timeline.message: [NETBEANS-3700] No more harcoding for Code Coverage Highlights.

timeline.bodyText: What does "inferred" mean? This green color is almost identical to that of nbcoverage-covered. It should be some distinct color.
timeline.author: eirikbakke
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -49,4 +49,8 @@
     <fontcolor name="text-limit-line-color" foreColor="ff555555"/>
     <fontcolor name="trailing-whitespace"/>
     <fontcolor name="west-sidebars-color"/>
+    <fontcolor name="coverage-covered" bgColor="005000"/>
+    <fontcolor name="coverage-uncovered" bgColor="404040"/>
+    <fontcolor name="coverage-inferred" bgColor="1c501c"/>

replies.bodyText: Well, that's a good question. Tried to look it up on jacoco, found nothing. Maybe did not try hard enough. I have not seen any sample where it is came up.
replies.author: lkishalmi

replies.bodyText: OK, they seem to be really close in the existing defaults as well. Maybe they're supposed to look the same... (nevermind this comment, I was looking at the BlueTheme)
replies.author: eirikbakke

replies.bodyText: Honestly I do not know. I'd leave it for the "community test-pad" If someone find an incurred and the coloring disturbed, let's change it until then, it is Ok. Unless I find an incurred line first...
replies.author: lkishalmi

timeline.bodyText: This one is a neutral grey, but it should be some variant of red. Perhaps try 813438 instead.
timeline.author: eirikbakke
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -49,4 +49,8 @@
     <fontcolor name="text-limit-line-color" foreColor="ff555555"/>
     <fontcolor name="trailing-whitespace"/>
     <fontcolor name="west-sidebars-color"/>
+    <fontcolor name="coverage-covered" bgColor="005000"/>
+    <fontcolor name="coverage-uncovered" bgColor="404040"/>

timeline.message: [NETBEANS-3700] No more harcoding for Code Coverage Highlights.
